page.title: 06TADWORTH COURT HOSPITAL
page.content: { Tadworth Court}is a 17th century brick mansion. Together with the outer buildings built in the 1920's they form the Tadworth Court Children's Hospital. The hospital was due to be closed but has been kept open through the {concern of the parents}who fought hard to have it kept open. They raised a lot of{badly needed money}by selling off part of their land. Over 250 houses are going to be built on this land. The hospital can take{56 patients. Most of the children are cared for at home and come into the hospital to give their parents a break in which they can renew their strength to continue looking after them.
